stem.name: Alternate
stem.definition: marks an alternative analysis; this particle is inserted into a proposition whenever one or more Alternative Analyses are included.

stem.name: CommentBegin
stem.definition: marks the beginning of a parenthetical comment

stem.name: CommentEnd
stem.definition: marks the end of a parenthetical comment

stem.name: QuoteBegin
stem.definition: beginning quote

stem.name: QuoteEnd
stem.definition: ending quote

stem.name: ReferenceMarker
stem.definition: marks a chapter and verse in a reference (Psalms 23 Reference Marker 1)
First in a list of items
Tenth in a list of items
Eleventh item in a list of items
Twelfth item in a list of items
Second in a list of items
Third in a list of items
Fourth in a list of items
Fifth in a list of items
Sixth in a list of items
Seventh in a list of items
Eighth in a list of items
Ninth in a list of items

stem.name: exclamation
stem.definition: marker for end of an exclamation

stem.name: no
stem.definition: negative response

stem.name: ok
stem.definition: signals that the speaker has changed his mind and now agrees with the listener

stem.name: please
stem.definition: particle of polite request, mitigates an imperative

stem.name: yes
stem.definition: affirmative response
